metertools.is_binary_equivalent¶

abjad.tools.metertools.is_binary_equivalent(meter)¶
True when meter is binary or when meter is nonbinary but mathematically equivalent to some binary meter, otherwise False.

Previous topic

metertools.get_nonbinary_factor

Next topic
